body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8809 for use in 2022 production - requested by the Madgraph contacts so these packages can be accessed inside CMSSW in the event of hepforge downtime.

Tested with the Herwig+Madgraph matchbox workflow 539 backported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43692
